title: Tanta logo - Sans serif
author: brickcity2010

comments.content: It looks like a colored Helvetica Bold in different sizes :-)
i was thinking the same thing but the small letter "t"of the helvetica looks different :/
i was thinking the same thing but the small letter "t"of the helvetica looks different :/

If so, they lengthened the right side of the t crossbar, but otherwise I would agree.

- Mike Yanega
They probably lengthened the /t crossbar to touch the /A's top corner...
